select.selectitems: path_constraint inverse_attribute_constraint select_constraint entity_constraint aggregate_member_constraint intersection_constraint attribute
constraint_attribute constraint_relationship inverse_attribute_constraint attribute end_of_path_constraint intersection_constraint type_constraint negation_constraint
named_type global_rule algorithm_definition constant_definition map_definition sub_supertype_constraint
schema_definition constant_definition named_type attribute algorithm_definition global_rule where_rule

entity.name: attribute_mapping_value
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (attribute_mapping_real_value, attribute_mapping_enumeration_value, attribute_mapping_logical_value, attribute_mapping_int_value, attribute_mapping_boolean_value, attribute_mapping_string_value)

entity.name: attribute_value_constraint
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (boolean_constraint, integer_constraint, non_optional_constraint, string_constraint, real_constraint, enumeration_constraint, logical_constraint)

entity.name: constraint
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (constraint_attribute, constraint_relationship, inverse_attribute_constraint, type_constraint, intersection_constraint, negation_constraint, end_of_path_constraint)

entity.name: declaration
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (inner_declaration, interfaced_declaration, local_declaration) AND ONEOF (data_type_declaration, rule_declaration, algorithm_declaration, constant_declaration, map_declaration, subtype_constraint_declaration)

where.label: wr1
where.expression: ( SIZEOF ( local_elements ) > 0 ) OR ( 'extended_dictionary_schema.extensible_enumeration_type' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) )

entity.name: select_type
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (non_extensible_select_type, extensible_select_type) ANDOR entity_select_type ANDOR extended_select_type

entity.name: simple_type
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (integer_type, number_type, real_type, boolean_type, logical_type, binary_type, string_type)

function.name: get_entity_definition
function.algorithm: LOCAL parent_entity : entity_definition ; END_LOCAL ; IF 'extended_dictionary_schema.entity_definition' IN TYPEOF ( parent ) THEN parent_entity := parent ; END_IF ; RETURN ( parent_entity ) ;

function.name: get_list_of_entity_definition
function.algorithm: LOCAL supertypes : LIST OF entity_definition := [ ] ; END_LOCAL ; REPEAT i := 1 TO SIZEOF ( generic_supertypes ) ; IF 'extended_dictionary_schema.entity_definition' IN TYPEOF ( generic_supertypes [ i ] ) THEN supertypes := supertypes + generic_supertypes [ i ] ; END_IF ; END_REPEAT ; RETURN ( supertypes ) ;

function.name: get_operands
function.algorithm: LOCAL operands : SET OF entity_or_subtype_expression := [ ] ; END_LOCAL ; REPEAT i := 1 TO SIZEOF ( operandz ) ; IF NOT ( 'extended_dictionary_schema.view_definition' IN TYPEOF ( operandz [ i ] ) ) THEN operands := operands + operandz [ i ] ; END_IF ; END_REPEAT ; RETURN ( operands ) ;

function.name: get_schema_definition
function.algorithm: LOCAL parent_schema : schema_definition ; END_LOCAL ; IF 'extended_dictionary_schema.schema_definition' IN TYPEOF ( parent ) THEN parent_schema := parent ; END_IF ; RETURN ( parent_schema ) ;
